price: 88. Dan jangan (pula) engkau sembah tuhan yang lain selain Allah. Tidak ada Tuhan (yang berhak disembah) melainkan Dia. Segala sesuatu pasti binasa, kecuali wajah-Nya (Allah). Segala keputusan menjadi wewenang-Nya, dan hanya kepada-Nya kamu dikembalikan.
arabic: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ كُلُّ شَيۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجۡهَهُۥۚ لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara lā ilāha illā huwa kullu shayin hālikun illā wajhahu lahu al-ḥuk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
